title: finding it hard to find a team to join need help... im lft to join
body: I main jg but can do other roles, I am currently b1 but have been In silver for a while before bronze. contact me to get the 5v5 games rolling for me

replies.body:
i know the feeling of not having a team im fairly new to ranked but i am started to get the hang of it. the only down side is most of my games are lost due to someone on my team whining and throwing the game. So im looking for a team of Friends or reliable people to play with but i too am also having no luck. Im thinking about asking a few of my 97 friends to see if they want to start a team with me but these people might not be as good for ranked or are jsut too high level for the current stage im in (#BronzeLyfeIsSad) D: but i hope u find a team soon xD.


#P.S: Idek y it says im lvl 18 here in game im lvl 30 and a bronze 5 xD still very new to ranked but top lane in ranked is fairly easy XD
